account.label: Merchant Account
account.comment: Don't have a PayPal account? Start accepting payments via PayPal! Simply enter your email address below.

business_account.label: Email address to accociate with PayPal

merchant_country.label: PayPal Merchant Country
merchant_country.comment: If not specified, Default Country from General Config will be used

express.label: Express Checkout
express.comment: Add an Express Checkout button to your existing shopping cart for quick and easy credit card payments. PayPal handles all payment processing.

wps.label: Website Payments Standard
wps.comment: PayPal processes all of your orders, and you get paid.

wpp.label: Website Payments Pro
wpp.comment: Process credit cards directly on your website with PayPal’s all-in-one online payment processing solution.

billing_agreement.label: Billing Agreement
billing_agreement.comment: Allow customers to sign billing agreements on PayPal website to ease their further purchases on your store.

wpp_pe.label: Website Payments Pro Payflow Edition (includes Express Checkout)
wpp_pe.comment: Accept PayPal payments in your shopping cart. PayPal will process your credit card payments through the Payflow Pro Gateway.

verisign.label: Payflow Pro Gateway
verisign.comment: Don’t have a PayPal merchant account? You can still accept credit card payments through the Payflow Pro Gateway.

express_pe.label: Express Checkout
express_pe.comment: Accept payments without customers leaving your website. Many popular web-hosting services and shopping carts come with the Payflow payment gateways built in, so they are easy to set up.

page_style.label: Page Style
page_style.tooltip: Allowable values: "paypal", "primary" (default), your_custom_value (a custom payment page style from your merchant account profile).

paypal_hdrimg.label: Header Image URL
paypal_hdrimg.tooltip: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.

paypal_hdrbackcolor.label: Header Background Color
paypal_hdrbackcolor.tooltip: The background color for the header of the checkout page. Case-insensitive six-character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.

paypal_payflowcolor.label: Page Background Color
paypal_payflowcolor.tooltip: The background color for the checkout page around the header and payment form.

logo.label: PayPal Product Logo
logo.comment: Displays on catalog pages and homepage.
